code: export var parseUTCDate=function parseUTCDate(apiDate){var utcDate=apiDate.split('');utcDate.splice(4,0,'-');utcDate.splice(7,0,'-');utcDate.splice(13,0,':');utcDate.splice(16,0,':');return new Date(utcDate.join(''));};export var getFullMinutes=function getFullMinutes(date){if(date.getMinutes()<10){return"0".concat(date.getMinutes());}return date.getMinutes();};export var calculateDelay=function calculateDelay(baseDepartureTime,realDepartureTime){if(baseDepartureTime.getTime()!==realDepartureTime.getTime()){var minutesDelay=(realDepartureTime.getTime()-baseDepartureTime.getTime())/(1000*60);if(minutesDelay>=60){return"retard ".concat(Math.floor(minutesDelay/60),"h").concat(minutesDelay%60);}return"retard\n\n".concat(minutesDelay," min.");}return"à l'heure";};
